<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Energy Mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1962)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
<trait label="Mutagen" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=116" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 60 <sup>1.1</sup>, [The Fall of Plaguestone](/Sources.aspx?ID=3) pg. 56</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When created, this mutagen is attuned to your choice of one of four energy types: acid, cold, electricity, or fire. When consumed, the mutagen suffuses your body with energy that spills out of you whenever you attack. At higher levels, it can even grant you the ability to unleash the energy in controlled bursts. 

**Benefit** You gain resistance to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add the listed amount of damage of the attuned energy type. 

**Drawback** You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Energy Mutagen (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 60 <sup>1.1</sup>, [The Fall of Plaguestone](/Sources.aspx?ID=3) pg. 56</row>

**Price** 4 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain resistance 5, add 1 damage on a hit with a melee weapon, and the duration is 1 minute.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Energy Mutagen (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 60 <sup>1.1</sup>, [The Fall of Plaguestone](/Sources.aspx?ID=3) pg. 56</row>

**Price** 12 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain resistance 10, add 1d4 damage on a hit with a melee weapon, and the duration is 10 minutes.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Energy Mutagen (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 60 <sup>1.1</sup>, [The Fall of Plaguestone](/Sources.aspx?ID=3) pg. 56</row>

**Price** 300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain resistance 15, add 1d6 damage on a hit with a melee weapon, and the duration is 1 hour. In addition, you can end the benefits of this mutagen to unleash a 30-foot cone of energy as a 2-action activity. This deals 2d6 damage of the attuned type for every full 10 minutes of duration remaining (maximum 8d6) to each creature in the area, with a DC 25 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Energy Mutagen (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 60 <sup>1.1</sup>, [The Fall of Plaguestone](/Sources.aspx?ID=3) pg. 56</row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain resistance 20, add 2d6 damage on a hit with a melee weapon, and the duration is 1 hour. In addition, you can end the benefits of this mutagen to unleash a 30-foot cone of energy as a 2-action activity. This deals 3d6 damage of the attuned type for every full 10 minutes of duration remaining (maximum 12d6) to each creature in the area, with a DC 32 basic Reflex save.
